entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Aklavik
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:13 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 35.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill near minus 42. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 40 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 40 with temperature rising to minus 35 by morning. Wind chill near minus 47. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 11:00 AM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 30. POP 30%
